S04n379:898: kiṃ tātāviha vakṣāmi daivena prerito'smi hi |
S04n379:900: kathamiti punaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ pitṛbhyāṃ siṃhalaḥ sutaḥ |
S04n379:903: ciraṃ niḥśvasya taṃ putraṃ paśyan tāvevamūcatuḥ |
S04n379:904: hā putra bhāgyato nau tvaṃ jīvanniha samāgataḥ |
S04n379:905: mā śucastaddhanaṃ naṣṭaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtvā sukhaṃ cara ||
S04n379:908: bahuratnāni naḥ santi yadi tvamiha nāgataḥ |
S04n379:911: tvayi putre vinaṣṭe'haṃ sādhayeyaṃ kathaṃ param || 190
S04n379:913: kiṃ kariṣyanti ratnāni vinā putreṇa sādhunā |
S04n379:915: mṛte ratnāni kiṃ kuryurvinā putreṇa sādhunā |
S04n379:929: tatra taṃ bālakaṃ putramaṃka āropya sarvataḥ |
S04n379:931: tatra sā preritā lokaiḥ siṃhalasya gṛhāntike |
S04n379:933: tatra lokāḥ samālokya bālakaṃ taṃ manoharam |
S04n379:939: bhagini tvaṃ sutā kasya kutaḥ kathamihāgatā |
S04n379:940: iti taiśca janaiḥ pṛṣṭā sā punarevamabravīt || 191
S04n379:950: tayeti prārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve lokāstatheti te |
S04n379:951: pratijñāya drutaṃ tasya siṃhalasya puro gatāḥ ||
S04n379:956: tadasmākaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhāryāṃ tāṃ svātmajaṃ ca tam |
S04n379:960: bhavanto na sutā rājño bhāryāpīyaṃ na me khalu |
S04n379:962: bālo'pyayaṃ na me putro nirmito māyayānayā |
S04n379:963: iti satyaṃ mayā jñātvā kathyate na mṛṣā khalu ||
S04n379:964: tacchrutvā te janāḥ sarve tasya pitroḥ puro gatāḥ |
S04n379:973: tāta neyaṃ sutā rājñaḥ bhāryāpi ca na me khalu |
S04n379:974: dārako'yaṃ na me putro nirmito māyayānayā ||
S04n379:979: sarvā api striyaḥ putra rākṣasya eva māyikāḥ |
S04n379:981: ityetatkathitaṃ tābhyāṃ śrutvā sa siṃhalaḥ sutaḥ |
S04n379:985: iti putroditaṃ śrutvā tau mātāpitarau punaḥ |
S04n379:987: dhāsyāmaḥ suta tāmenāṃ tavaivārthe gṛhe sadā |
S04n379:991: tatra sā sundarī kāntā saputrā dvāre sannidhau |
S04n379:997: iti tairniveditaṃ śrutvā rājā sa siṃhakeśalī |
S04n379:1002: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sundarī kāntāṃ rājāsau rāgamohitaḥ |
S04n379:1004: tataḥ sa nṛpatiḥ paśyan pṛṣṭvā tāṃ kauśalaṃ mudā |
S04n379:1006: tacchrutvā pramadā sā taṃ paśyantī nṛpatiṃ cirāt |
S04n379:1009: sārthavāhasya bhāryārthaṃ dadau sa nṛpatiḥ svayam ||
S04n379:1020: iti tayoktamākarṇya nṛpatiḥ sa samīkṣya tām |
S04n379:1024: iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te mantriṇo drutam |
S04n379:1026: dṛṣṭvā taṃ samupāyātaṃ siṃhalaṃ sa narādhipaḥ |
S04n379:1029: siṃhalaṃ kena bhāryeṣā tvayā tyaktā nṛpātmajā |
S04n379:1031: ityādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā sa siṃhalo vaṇik |
S04n379:1033: deva naiṣā sutā rājño bhāryāpi me suto'pyayam |
S04n379:1036: siṃhalaṃ tāṃ ca samīkṣya punarevaṃ samādiśat ||
S04n379:1038: yedyeṣā nābhipretā te tyaktvā me dīyatāṃ tvayā ||
S04n379:1041: rākṣasīyaṃ mahārāja na dadyām nāpi vāraye |
S04n379:1042: bhavān samyagvicāryaiva karotu te hitaṃ yathā ||
S04n379:1044: ityuktvā siṃhato dhīraḥ tataḥ saṃpresthito gṛhe ||
S04n379:1047: tataḥ sā ramaṇī kāntā rājānaṃ taṃ pramohitam |
S04n379:1049: tayaiva saha saṃrakto rājā sa kāmananditaḥ |
S04n379:1050: yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā cacāra svecchayā raman ||
S04n379:1051: evaṃ sā rākṣasī nityaṃ ramayitvā yathecchayā |
S04n379:1053: tataḥ sā rākṣasī rātro rājakulāśritān janān |
S04n379:1058: tatra sā sahasopeya tāḥ sarvā api rākṣasī |
S04n379:1064: āgacchata mayā sārdhaṃ sahasā tatra caremahi |
S04n379:1068: tatra tāḥ sahasopetya sarvā rājakule sthitān |
S04n379:1074: tatra prātaḥ samāyātā amātyā mantriṇo janāḥ |
S04n379:1075: pakṣiṇo bhramato dṛṣṭvā tasthuḥ sarve'pi vismitāḥ ||
S04n379:1076: kathaṃ rājakulaṃ dvāraṃ nodghāṭitaṃ ca sāmpratam |
S04n379:1080: tatra tāṃ janatāṃ paśyansiṃhalaḥ sa upāśritaḥ |
S04n379:1083: tadrājāpi janāḥ sarve rākṣasyā bhakṣitā khalu ||
S04n379:1091: taduktaṃ mantriṇaḥ śrutvā niḥśreṇiṃ sahasā janaiḥ |
S04n379:1093: tān dṛṣṭvā siṃhalaḥ khaḍgaṃ dhṛtvābhiruhya saṃkraman |
S04n379:1097: tāsāṃ kāścicchiro dhṛtvā kāścitpādān bhujān parāḥ |
S04n379:1098: tāḥ sarvā api rākṣasyaḥ palāyitāstato drutam ||
S04n379:1102: gatva samīkṣya rājādīn sarvān bhuktān vicukruśuḥ ||
S04n379:1103: suciraṃ vilapitvā te sarve'pi mantriṇo janāḥ |
S04n379:1105: tataḥ sa siṃhalo dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃstān mantriṇo janān |
S04n379:1113: bhavanto'tra mṛto rājā vaṃśastasya na vidyate |
S04n379:1116: iti tairmantribhiḥ proktaṃ śrutvā te brāhmaṇādayaḥ |
S04n379:1122: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā kecidvijñā mahājanāḥ |
S04n379:1130: iti tairuditaṃ śrutvā te'mātyā mantriṇo janāḥ |
S04n379:1141: yadyogyaṃ karma tatraiva yojanīyo hi mantribhiḥ ||
S04n379:1142: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā te'mātyā mantriṇo janāḥ |
S04n379:1149: iti tairmantribhiḥ sarvaiḥ saṃprārthitaṃ niśamya saḥ |
S04n379:1151: bhavanto yadi māṃ sarve rājānaṃ kartumicchatha |
S04n379:1153: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te mantriṇo janāḥ |
S04n379:1165: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve mantriṇo janāḥ |
S04n379:1168: sarve'pi saṃmataṃ kṛtvā taṃ nṛpaṃ kartumārabhan ||
S04n379:1176: tataḥ sa siṃhalo rāja sarvāṃllokāan vinodayan |
S04n379:1180: tadā tasya prabho rājye sarvatra viṣayeṣvapi |
S04n379:1199: sarvā ekatra saṃmilya mitha evaṃ samūcire ||
S04n379:1214: kṣamasva no mahārāja vrajāmaḥ śaraṇe tava |
S04n379:1215: tadasmān yoṣito bālā hantuṃ nārhati kṣatriyaḥ ||
S04n379:1216: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tābhiḥ śrutvā sa siṃhalaḥ prabhuḥ |
S04n379:1217: samayena kṣayaṃ va iti tā vīkṣyābravīt ||
S04n379:1221: tathā sarve vayaṃ dhṛtvā cariṣyāmaḥ sadāpi hi ||
S04n379:1222: itiḥ tābhiḥ samākhyātaṃ niśamya sa nṛpaḥ sudhīḥ |
S04n379:1227: tadanyathā kṛte yuṣmān sarvā hanyāṃ sa saṃśayaḥ ||
S04n379:1228: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā tāḥ sakalā api |
S04n379:1235: tatra sa siṃhalo rājā sāmātyā mantriṇo janāḥ |
S04n379:1237: tatra te sakalā lokā dhṛtvā tannupaśāsanam |
S04n379:1244: yaḥ siṃhakeśarī rājā jyeṣṭha eva mahallakaḥ ||
S04n379:1245: tadābhūdrākṣasī yā sā veṣā evānupamā khalu |
S04n379:1247: tadāpyevaṃ sa lokeśo bodhisattvo vilokya mām |
S04n379:1249: evaṃ sa trijagannātho bodhisattvaḥ sadā svayam |
S04n379:1251: tenāsya sadṛśo dharmo nāsti kasyāpi kutracit |
S04n379:1258: durgatiṃ te na gacchanti saṃprayānti sukhāvatīm ||
S04n379:1263: iti vijñāya ye sattvāḥ samīcchanti jināspadam |
S04n379:1265: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāśritāḥ |
